title: With Possible Strike Looming, U.S. Says Staff Can Leave Israel, and Urges Speed
summary_full: In an email to embassy workers Friday morning, Ambassador Mike Huckabee warned them that if they wanted to leave Israel, they “should do so TODAY.”
summary_public: In an email to embassy workers Friday morning, Ambassador Mike Huckabee warned them that if they wanted to leave Israel, they “should do so TODAY.”

IL.label: neutral
IL.evidence: Staff Can Leave Israel, and Urges Speed
